short_summary: Services and digital strategic advisory services
description: Transport Canada requires the services of three specialized resources to support different projects and initiatives across the department.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title**

Services and Digital Strategic Advisory Services

**Reference Number**

cb-5889-82158537 (Amendment 1)

**Solicitation Number**

T8080-220698

**Published**

Published on May 25, 2023

**Closing Date**

June 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Background**

Transport Canada is seeking the services of specialized resources to support the development and implementation of digital solutions and supporting technologies and processes to modernize services.

**Requirements**

The Department requires three resources with expertise in:

- Rapid digital solution development and implementation
- Supporting technologies and processes
- Service modernization

**Scope of Work**

The proposed resources will support various projects and initiatives across the Department.

**Evaluation Criteria**

- Technical merit and price

**Procurement Process**

This is a competitive selective tendering process.

**Notice Type**

Request for Proposal - English and French

**Trade Agreements**

Applicable to this procurement are the following trade agreements:

- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**

This procurement is open to all regions of Canada.

**Regions of Delivery**

The contracted services will be delivered nationally.

**Contracting Entity**

Transport Canada is the contracting entity.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact Barbara Gorman at (343) 550-2175 or barbara.gorman@tc.gc.ca.

**Attachments**

English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5889/npp-t8080-220698-english.pdf

French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5889/npp-t8080-220698-french.pdf

Please let me know if you'd like me to revise anything! 400 words was definitely a restriction but I tried my best to reformat the original text in a way that's professional and easily scannable. I was careful to preserve key details and highlight important requirements. If you'd like
